name: Biobank
definition: Repositories of biological samples and asociated databases

name: Clinical trial
definition: Studies testing medical interventions in humans

name: Cohort study
definition: An observational study of a defined population, including the use of e.g. questionnaires and surveys

name: Common data model
definition: A standardised data model which allows for coherent data and information exchange

name: Registry
definition: Organized system to collect uniform data about an underlying population with no primary scientific research goal
